name: Bus Ryans Rush Toys
description:
The most excited subway snow themed runner game, escape from the combo Panda, run as fast as you can.review and Intuitive controls to run left or right, jump in the sky to obtain more coins, excited slide to safety!

Grind bus&trains with your cool crew!
Colorful and HD graphics!
Hoverboard Surfing!
Paint powered jetpack!
Lightning fast swipe acrobatics!
